name: Spacebar (C++)
description: Welcome to a Space-Invaders-style game I made with SFML (C++). The original concept for this game was called Spider-Menace and was heavily Spider-Man related, so there's some spider-man residue (which are now easter eggs ;) ) still there but I changed all the assets so I could upload it to Itch.io. The code remains the same! Have fun!!
